channel.title: Help plz!
channel.description: hey guys i need help on how to make my runserver and complier work with hamachi. when i go into the complier and type "r" for runserver it says that i need a Server.class and when i try to complie it says I need java files. can anyone plz help my server work?[br][size=1]Posted on: August 02, 2007, 08:04:42 AM[/size][hr]someone plz help

item.title: Help plz!
item.dc:creator: @Onono6 Onono6
item.description:
@Onono6 wrote:

its in winrar. in the source[br][size=1]Posted on: August 02, 2007, 08:55:19 AM[/size][hr]can anyone else plz help?

item.description:
@toonshorty wrote:

is you client.java in the same folder as your compiler?

Read full topic

am i supposed to extract to a different folder?

Read full topic

item.title: Help plz!
item.dc:creator: @toonshorty toonshorty
item.description:
@toonshorty wrote:

Are your client.java files in a different folder? if they are you will have to move them into the same folder as the runserver/compiler.

Also when you sign into hamatchi you will get a code at the top mine is 5.166.244.39. This is called a static IP and this is the code that people will use to connect to your server. So in the server IP they must put your Static IP

Note: many people do not like hamatchi servers, you should TRY and get no-ip

Read full topic
